name: ChainLink
description:
This is an expanded prototype made as a part of Forge Jam V. Play as a damaged mechanical guardian traversing a massive ruin with nothing but a pair of giant spiked wheels on chains for locomotion. Grab, swing and fling yourself to collect all of the orbs and complete the game.

Requires an XBox 360 or similar controller with two analog sticks and two triggers.

Controls: Left/Right Joysticks - Move left/right wheel.

Left/Right Trigger - Grab with the left/right wheel

Escape Key - Exit Game

Features the song "Break Life" by Matt "Willow" Willard (DJPigeon)
